title: גיק ג'וב: אוסף משרות היי-טק חמות במיוחד (והפעם: מינימום ניסיון)
description: גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Online Marketing ,Affiliate Manager, Big Data Developer ,Junior Professional Services Engineer Junior, Security Analyst Junior, PHP Developer
articleBody:
גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Online Marketing ,Affiliate Manager, Big Data Developer ,Junior Professional Services Engineer Junior, Security Analyst Junior, PHP Developer

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
תמיכה יומיומית שוטפת ומתן שירות לשותפים העסקיים של האתר (Affiliates)
מתן הצעות למיקסום פעילויות השותפים באמצעות פעולות קידום משותפות.
פיתוח ערוצים חדשים, תוכניות שיווק למוצרים חדשים, שיתופי פעולה עסקיים ואסטרטגיות משותפות.
מיקסום הרווחים של השותפים תוך עידוד הרחבת הפעילות שלהם.
ניתוח דוחות וזיהוי פוטנציאל צמיחה.
מעקב שוטף אחר הפעילויות של השותפים – ניתוח ביצועים, שיפור תהליכים ומתן הצעות להגדלת הכנסות.
מתן ייעוץ ותמיכה בפן השיווקי לצורך הגדלת ה-Traffic של השחקנים.
השתתפות בתערוכות מקצועיות, כנסים, פורומים ויוזמות.
דרישות:

אנגלית ברמה גבוהה; שפות נוספת – יתרון משמעותי.
ניסיון במכירות (עדיפות לניסיון בעולם ה-ONLINE).
ניסיון קודם בניהול תיקי לקוחות – יתרון משמעותי.
רקע בעולם האינטרנט – חובה.
תואר ראשון בכלכלה, שיווק או הנהלת חשבונות – יתרון.
ניסיון בתחום ה-Gaming – יתרון משמעותי.
להגשת קורות חיים למשרת Affiliate Manager – 888
 
NI is a digital commerce company that connects engaged consumers with valuable brands. We exist to simplify consumer decision-making, and we do so by creating trusted comparison websites that nurture and enable high-value relationships between these consumers and the brands they choose. Our clients, some of which are among the most prominent websites worldwide, utilize our platform to enhance their online presence.
We are seeking a highly energetic Biz Dev operations to join our great team.
Responsibilities:
Carry out day to day operations for the business development department, including internal processes and administrative aspects.
Pulling data from partner and network reporting systems
Work closely with a variety of different teams – Business, financial & Technical.
Requirements:

Fluent English
Attention to details
Excellent time management and organizational skills
Fast learner who is Self-Motivated
Comfortable with technology
Experience in an online company – an advantage
Experience in a similar/back office role – an advantage

To send a CV for the position of Biz Dev operations – Natural Intelligence
Managing online and offline campaigns in variety of platforms. The marketing Campaigns
Manager is responsible for analyzing data and optimizing campaigns performance by investigating the markets preferences, think of attractive creatives and analyzing the campaigns data in order to decide what to do next. Working with leading companies: Google, Facebook, Bing, Twitter etc.
Requirements:

B.Sc. in Engineering/BA Statistics or similar- Grade average 80 and up.
Analytical abilities.
High level of English
Excel skills
Additional languages – advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Online Marketing – plus500
Playtika is a global leader in social network and mobile gaming applications!
We are seeking a full stack developer who is passionate about coding & data to help us build out our next generation scalable big data processing and analytics systems.
Requirements:
– At least one year of experience in java programming.
– At least one year of experience building and managing complex products/solutions.
– Hands on contribution to biz logic using Hadoop`s ecosystem- strong advantage.
– Work on technologies related to SQL and InMemory platforms.
To send a CV for the position of Big Data Developer – Playtika
Checkmarx is looking for a part-time Jr. App Security Researcher to be a part of the Checkmarx Security Experts Team. Job involves collaborating with developers, security experts and analysts focused on application security.
Analysis and Integration of vulnerability descriptions in Checkmarx product
Supporting the Security Experts Team research of application and web application vulnerabilities
Reviewing and analyzing security audit results
Requirements:

B.Sc or higher degree in Computer Science or other relevant disciplines (CS students will also be considered)
Great interest in information security – must
Self-motivated and able to self-learn – must
Ability to read programming source code (sometimes of unfamiliar languages) – must
Knowledge of common scripting languages – advantage
Strong analysis and problem solving skills
Good English writing and speaking capabilities
Team player with organizational skills
To send a CV for the position of Junior Security Analyst – Checkmarx
We invite all software developers to apply. We are looking for top talent
We code in Javascript but if you have the ability to learn it, we will train you
to be one of the top developers worldwide
The work will be done remotely or from our offices in Israel, together with our R&D team
Always dreamt of being part of successful start-up company? Hola is an amazing team of 90 talents located all around the world. We are growing fast, and expect to be 200 employees in 2016.
We are building a peer-to-peer overlay network, bound to make the internet less centralized, more open, and, in one word — better. Our services, used by 60 million people, include a free VPN extension, a business intelligence network, and a content delivery for video (CDN), aimed at making video distribution faster and cheaper.
Global approach- We believe that the finest products are developed by small teams of great programmers. We are a small group of developers and we’re are interested in finding the best professionals in the world to join our team and develop the new generation of the internet.
Special Benefits
Best Compensation Package- enjoy one the most competitive compensation packages available in your country
In-House Chef- In Israel- eat every day fresh, healthy meals prepared by our in-house chef.
Gear Provided- anything you need to succeed in your work, we’ll provide
Full Administration Services- our administrative team will make your experience unforgettable.
Weekly Presents- every week, special treats for the employees
Best Team Ever- enjoy the opportunity of working with an A-level team
Dogsitter- we have a dogsitter for your dog, feel free to bring him over
Requirements:
Star employees are hard to find, that’s why we need your help to find the best software developers around the world. Hola is offering a prize to whoever helps us find a new developer. If your recommended developer ultimately joins Hola and spends at least 3 months in our company, you will receive a USD 7,000 reward.
To send a CV for the position of Software Developer – Hola Better Internet
 
We’re looking for a talented Junior PHP developers with excellent full stack skills.
Requirements:

One year experience with PHP or Bachelor of
Computer Science / Software Engineering – Must
CSS/3,HTML/5,JS,JQuery – Must
Experience with Backbone/Bootstrap, Angular
JS and Symphony – advantage
To send a CV for the position of Junior PHP Developer – Salestech
The organization : Design Technologies & Solutions organization develops software solutions used by Intel hardware engineers to design the next-generation processors and validate them during different stages of the processor development.
This position is for developing and deploying new solutions for validating the CPU/system faster and in higher quality. The engineer will work closely with validation team to define, develop and maintain solutions using in-house SW tools. The works include defining and implementing POCs for new validation methods, Development of SW layers and libraries, deployment and support of existing solutions, maintain quality of SW validation packages.
Requirements:

Engineers should possess a BSC degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering or Computer Science
A team player with excellent customer orientation and communication skills
Experience in working on CPU validation, working with large and complicated SW systems – an advantage
Knowledge in assembly level and Intel Architecture – an advantage
To send a CV for the position of R&D SW Engineer – Intel
We’re looking for a  Full Stack Developer, to develop cool software that is used by the largest mobile game apps around the world. You’ll be working in a small and dynamic team, using the latest technologies:
HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript,  JOuery, React
Big Data Databases (Relational and NoSQL)
Amazon AWS
NodeJS
This is an opportunity to work with Perion GrowMobile, a small and selected group, a startup within a leading company. GrowMobile is a revolutionary platform providing mobile app developers unique distribution and promotion solutions for their apps.
Requirements:
If you have experience in most of our technologies and you’re eager to learn the rest – send us your CV.
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Developer – Perion
 
FEEDVISOR IS LOOKING FOR A JUNIOR PROFESSIONAL SERVICES ENGINEER (PSE) TO JOIN OUR AWESOME AND SUCCESSFUL CUSTOMER SUCCESS TEAM. THE JR. PSE IS YOUR CHANCE TO JOIN A PROMISING START-UP AND PUT YOUR HI-TECH CAREER ON THE FAST TRACK.
THIS POSITION IS IN CHARGE OF CREATING AND DELIVERING BESPOKE CUSTOMER SOLUTIONS FOR DRIVING MORE REVENUES.
YOU WILL PLAY A VITAL ROLE IN OUR CUSTOMERS BUSINESS GROWTH AND THE SUCCESSFUL IMPLEMENTATION OF OUR SOLUTIONS. HOW DO YOU KNOW IF THIS POSITION IS FOR YOU? YOU’RE SO SHARP PENCILS ENVY YOU.
YOU’RE SO ADEPT AT MULTITASKING, YOU’RE READING THIS WHILE JUGGLING. YOU’RE SO SELF-MOTIVATED, YOUR APPLICATION IS HALF-SUBMITTED AND YOU HAVEN’T EVEN GOTTEN TO THE REQUIREMENTS YET! YOU LOVE DETAILS, YOU CRUSH DEADLINES, WORSHIP EXCEL AND NOT ASHAMED OF SAYING SO OUT LOUD.
RESOURCEFUL LIKE MACGYVER, PROFESSIONAL LIKE JOBS, AND WITH THE KIND OF HUMOR THAT MEANS YOU UNDERSTAND WHY A JOB DESCRIPTION SHOULD BE FUN TO READ.
KEY AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY:
DELIVER SOLUTIONS TO ADDRESS HIGHLY SOPHISTICATED CUSTOMER NEEDS.
ENHANCE AND IMPROVE EXISTING PROCESSES AND DELIVERABLES.
DEVELOP SOLUTIONS THAT LEVERAGE CAPABILITIES TO ADDRESS NEW CUSTOMER NEEDS
MAINTAIN AND DOCUMENT KNOWLEDGE OF PROCEDURES AND SYSTEMS
Requirements:
EXCEL WIZARD – MUST
WORKING ON / COMPLETED BACHELOR’S DEGREE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE/ENGINEERING /ECONOMICS
SQL – SIGNIFICANT ADVANTAGE
JAVA – SIGNIFICANT ADVANTAGE
ABILITY TO COMMUNICATE WITH OTHER TEAMS (SUCH AS TECHNICAL SUPPORT, SALES, CUSTOMER SUCCESS) TO ADDRESS SPECIFIC BUSINESS NEEDS WITH A TECHNOLOGY SOLUTION.
ABILITY TO PERFORM TROUBLESHOOTING AND DEMONSTRATE ANALYTICAL SKILLS
POSSESS GOOD TEAMWORK SKILLS
FLUENT ENGLISH
To send a CV for the position of Junior Professional Services Engineer – feedvisor
keywords: משרות,משרות בהיי-טק,גיק ג\'וב,דרושים,משרות חמות,ללא נסיון,online marketing,intel,salestech,checkmarx,,natural intelligence,plus500,888,playtika,hola better internet,perion,affiliate manager,big data developer,junior professional services engineer,junior security analyst,junior php developer,software developer,r&d sw engineer (experienced) - haifa,full stack developer,feedvisor,r&d sw engineer (experienced) - haifa,​salestech​,ללא נסיון intel
